newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS upgrades Hees, confirms debt, pfds.
newsitem.headline: DBRS upgrades Hees, confirms debt, pfds.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service said on Tuesday it upgraded the rating on Hees International Bancorp Inc's commercial paper to R-1 (low) from R-2 (high), with a stable trend and confirmed the rating on Hees' senior notes and debentures, medium term notes, subordinated notes and debentures and preferred shares.

DBRS said Hees had regained the confidence of most financial institutions and had open access to short and long-term capital markets. It added its debt maturities were longer term and the balance sheet had reasonable leverage.
